title: Brett Gillard
text:
Brett Gillard is an Australian former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played as a <a href="Rugby%20league%20positions%23The%20back%20row">back-row forward</a> in the 1980s and 1990s.
He played in 40 matches for <a href="Sydney%20Roosters">Eastern Suburbs</a> in the years 1989–92, <a href="Penrith%20Panthers">Penrith Panthers</a> 1993& 94, Gold Coast Seagulls later renamed the Gold Coast "Chargers" 1995 & 96 and a season with the <a href="South%20Sydney%20Rabbitohs">South Sydney</a> club in 1997.
Gillard in currently associated with one of Eastern Suburbs junior clubs', the <a href="Clovelly%20Crocodiles">Clovelly Crocodiles</a>, in junior development.
